    • registerRestaurant

      public void registerRestaurant​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String nit, java.lang.String adminName) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      creates and adds and instance of the class Restaurant to the list of restaurants
      Parameters:
      name - a String, not null not empty
      nit - a String, not null not empty
      adminName - a String, not null not empty
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if cannot find the file where it is supposed to save data after adding the restaurant
      java.io.IOException - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after adding the restaurant

    • checkProdToAdd

      public void checkProdToAdd​(java.lang.String restNit, java.lang.String codeOfProd) throws exceptions.ProductDoesNotBelongToRestaurant, exceptions.ProductDoesNotExistException
      checks if the Product to be added belongs to the restaurant the order is being made to
      Parameters:
      restNit - a String, not null, the NIT of the restaurant the order is being made to
      codeOfProd - a String, not null, the code of the product to be checked
      Throws:
      exceptions.ProductDoesNotBelongToRestaurant - if the product does not belong to the same restaurant the order is being made to
      exceptions.ProductDoesNotExistException - if there is not a product registered with that code

    • registerOrder

      public void registerOrder​(java.lang.String code, java.lang.String idn, java.lang.String nitRes, java.util.List<java.lang.String> codes, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> quantities, java.util.Date date) throws exceptions.ProductsAreNotOfTheSameRestaurantException, java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      creates and adds and instance of the class Order to the list of orders
      Parameters:
      code - a String,not null nor empty
      idn - a String,not null nor empty
      nitRes - a String,not null nor empty
      codes - a List of String, not null
      quantities - a List of int, not null
      date - a Date, not null
      Throws:
      exceptions.ProductsAreNotOfTheSameRestaurantException - if the products are not of the same restaurant as the one the order is being made to
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if cannot find the file where it is supposed to save data after adding the order
      java.io.IOException - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after adding the order

    • checkProdsOfSameRes

      public void checkProdsOfSameRes​(java.lang.String nitRes, java.util.ArrayList<model.Product> prodsOfOrder) throws exceptions.ProductsAreNotOfTheSameRestaurantException
      checks if the products of the given ArrayList belong to the same restaurant
      Parameters:
      nitRes - a String, not empty not null, the NIT of the restaurant to which the products should belong to
      prodsOfOrder - an ArrayList of Product, not empty nor null
      Throws:
      exceptions.ProductsAreNotOfTheSameRestaurantException - if the products do not belong to the restaurant

      public java.lang.String getRestNitOfOrder​(java.lang.String code)
      returns the NIT if the restaurant to which the order with the code provided was made
      Parameters:
      code - a String, not null, the code of the order to be checked, the order and its restaurant must have been registered already

    • updateOrderProductsAndQuantities

      public void updateOrderProductsAndQuantities​(java.lang.String code, java.util.List<java.lang.String> codes, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> quantities, java.lang.String nitRes) throws exceptions.ProductsAreNotOfTheSameRestaurantException, java.io.IOException
      updates an order's products and quantities
      Parameters:
      code - a String not empty nor null, identifies the order
      codes - a List of Strings, not null, contains the codes of the new products of the order
      quantities - a List of int, not null, contains the quantities of the new products of the order
      nitRes - a String not empty nor null, the NIT of the restaurant to which the order with the code provided was made
      Throws:
      exceptions.ProductsAreNotOfTheSameRestaurantException - if the products are not of the same restaurant as the one the order is being made to
      java.io.IOException - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after updating the order

      newRestNit - the new NIT of the restaurant to which the order with the code provided was made
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after updating the order

      public void updateOrderState​(java.lang.String code, int dec, int stateInt) throws java.io.IOException

      Parameters:
      code - a String not empty nor null, identifies the order to update
      dec - an int, 1,2 or 3 identifying the new state of the order
      stateInt - an int, 1,2,3 or 4 identifying the current state of the order
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after updating the order

      java.io.IOException - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after importing the clients

    • importProducts

      public void importProducts​(java.lang.String fn) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException, exceptions.RestaurantDoesNotExistException
      imports , if possible, product information from a .csv file
      Parameters:
      fn - a String, the name of the file to import
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file to import cannot be found
      java.io.IOException - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after importing the products
      exceptions.RestaurantDoesNotExistException - if there is not a restaurant registered with the imported code

    • importOrders

      public void importOrders​(java.lang.String fn) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException, exceptions.OrderAlreadyExistsException
      imports , if possible, order information from a .csv file
      Parameters:
      fn - a String, the name of the file to import
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file to import cannot be found
      java.io.IOException - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after importing the orders
      exceptions.OrderAlreadyExistsException - if an order with the code of an order being imported already exists

    • resCheckNit

      public void resCheckNit​(java.lang.String nit) throws exceptions.RestaurantAlreadyExistsException
      checks if a restaurant exists with a given NIT in order to register a restaurant with that NIT
      Parameters:
      nit - a String, the NIT to be checked
      Throws:
      exceptions.RestaurantAlreadyExistsException - if it exists already

    • prodCheckProdCode

      public void prodCheckProdCode​(java.lang.String c) throws exceptions.ProductAlreadyExistsException
      checks if a product exists with a given code in order to register a product with that code
      Parameters:
      c - a String, the code to be checked
      Throws:
      exceptions.ProductAlreadyExistsException - if it exists already

    • otherCheckNit

      public void otherCheckNit​(java.lang.String nit) throws exceptions.RestaurantDoesNotExistException
      checks if a restaurant exists with the NIT provided, in order to use that restaurant somewhere else
      Parameters:
      nit - a String, not null, the NIT to be checked
      Throws:
      exceptions.RestaurantDoesNotExistException - if there is not a restaurant registered with that NIT

    • otherCheckProdCode

      public void otherCheckProdCode​(java.lang.String c) throws exceptions.ProductDoesNotExistException
      checks if a product exists with the code provided, in order to use that product somewhere else
      Parameters:
      c - a String, not null, the code to be checked
      Throws:
      exceptions.ProductDoesNotExistException - if there is not a product registered with that code

    • clientCheckId

      public void clientCheckId​(java.lang.String idn) throws exceptions.ClientAlreadyExistsException
      checks if a client exists with the ID number provided, in order to register a new client with that ID number
      Parameters:
      idn - a String, not null, the ID number to be checked
      Throws:
      exceptions.ClientAlreadyExistsException - if there is a client registered with that ID number

    • otherCheckId

      public void otherCheckId​(java.lang.String idn) throws exceptions.ClientDoesNotExistException
      checks if a client exists with the ID number provided, in order to use that client somewhere else
      Parameters:
      idn - a String, not null, the ID number to be checked
      Throws:
      exceptions.ClientDoesNotExistException - if there is not a client registered with that ID number

    • otherCheckOrdCode

      public void otherCheckOrdCode​(java.lang.String code) throws exceptions.OrderDoesNotExistException
      checks if an order exists with the code provided, in order to use that Order somewhere else
      Parameters:
      code - a String, not null, the code of the order to check
      Throws:
      exceptions.OrderDoesNotExistException - if there is not an order with that code registered
